code: import React from"react";import{useApolloClient}from"@apollo/react-hooks";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";export var Logout=function Logout(){var client=useApolloClient();var userLogout=function userLogout(){localStorage.removeItem("authToken");client.writeData({data:{isLoggedIn:false}});};return React.createElement(Link,{as:"button",to:"#",onClick:function onClick(){return userLogout(client);}},"Logout");};
